titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the Secretary of the Navy should name a Littoral Combat Ship the U.S.S. Ypsilanti, in honor of Ypsilanti, Michigan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Seapower and Projection Forces.

bill.summary: 5/4/2011--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the Secretary of the Navy should name a littoral combat ship in honor of Ypsilanti, Michigan.
